title: I_have_seen_the_future
description: IntroductionNot much here except very simple features that build on the fact we know the future... In all time series competition where you're allowed to use future events the best features are time to next session for a given visitor. This competition is no exception. I left part of the features I already tested and don't seem to generalize... but what can we really trust here ?
